description: Don't miss out on an on-the-set tour of the filming of "Drain Your Load," a Lucas Entertainment production filmed in Montreal, Canada. There's just as much fun behind the scenes of a hardcore gay porn movie as there is when it's all quiet on the set, and it's never been apparent. But who wouldn't have fun with hot guys like Johnny Venture, Manuel DeBoxer, Adam Avery, Adrian Long, Brandon Jones, Kyle Quinn, Nick Ford, Pierre Fitch, Ryan Russell, and Sam Steel!
title: Go Behind the Scenes of 'Drain Your Load'
